001package com.github.aecsocket.calibre.paper;
002
003import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.Logging;
004import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.bounds.Bound;
005import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.bounds.Box;
006import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.serializers.Serializers;
007import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector3;
008import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.raycast.PaperRaycast;
009import io.leangen.geantyref.TypeToken;
010import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
011import org.bukkit.Material;
012import org.bukkit.World;
013import org.bukkit.block.data.BlockData;
014import org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.SerializationException;
015
016import java.util.Map;
017
018public final class Raycasts {
019    private static final String FLUID = "fluid";
020    private static final Box BOX = Box.box(Vector3.ZERO, Vector3.vec3(1));
021
022    private final CalibrePlugin plugin;
023    private PaperRaycast.Builder raycastBuilder;
024
025    Raycasts(CalibrePlugin plugin) {
026        this.plugin = plugin;
027    }
028
029    public void load() {
030        raycastBuilder = PaperRaycast.builder()
031            .blockBound(Material.AIR, b -> true, b -> b.put(FLUID, BOX))
032            .blockBound(Material.WATER, b -> true, b -> b.put(FLUID, BOX))
033            .blockBound(Material.LAVA, b -> true, b -> b.put(FLUID, BOX));
034        for (var entry : plugin.settings().root().node("raycasts").childrenMap().entrySet()) {
035            BlockData data = Bukkit.createBlockData(""+entry.getKey());
036            try {
037                Map<String, Bound> bound = Serializers.require(entry.getValue(), new TypeToken<Map<String, Bound>>() {});
038                raycastBuilder.blockBound(data.getMaterial(), b -> b.matches(data), bound);
039            } catch (SerializationException e) {
040                plugin.log(Logging.Level.WARNING, e, "Could not load bounds entry");
041            }
042        }
043    }
044
045    public PaperRaycast build(PaperRaycast.Options options, World world) {
046        return raycastBuilder.build(options, world);
047    }
048}
